titleStmt.title: Universal love to the lost: with the voice of the chief-sheep-herd, to gather the scattered number together.
titleStmt.author: D. W. (Dorothy White)

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Dorothy White by Wing (2nd ed.).
Place and date of publication from Wing (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: stained, tightly bound and cropped, with considerable loss of text, possible loss of imprint and author's name. Best copy available for photographing.
Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
